html:
2.1.18  8:07 am   I have a list of questions to which you normally respond but there is a range of questions to which you don't. So your personality graph can be easily plotted using the above-mentioned data. Have you ever thought about this stuff?

     that's not necessarily true, your system doesn't take into account that i am a reasonably well known person and there are many things i can't answer for that reason

2.1.18  7:59 am   How can i deal with the information overflow? I mean i have this constant urge to gain knowledge about everything, be it the calculus involved in Theory of Relativity or how french revolution started.

     i think you will find that it can be a fun challenge to try to see what you can learn in the limited amount of time we have here

2.1.18  7:47 am   How do you feel about how you feel?

     fine

2.1.18  7:44 am   Is the sheet music at the end of "you're free to do whatever you want to" the actual sheet music you wrote for the song?

     yes. it underwent some changes some time a few years later, the 'wednesday thursday' part was added. the original ending was different

2.1.18  7:41 am   Are you high or low when making videos?

     sure

2.1.18  6:40 am   do you ever dress up like a girl

     i haven't done it in a long time

2.1.18  6:33 am   how do you learn music?

     i don't know. it just happens

2.1.18  6:32 am   can you type in capital letters?

     can you

2.1.18  6:27 am   where does money come from? 

     it was created in the big bang

2.1.18  4:56 am   is it true that you have never replied to anyone on twitter

     using the @ function on twitter is not something that i think makes for good twitter content. that's just how i feel, from a reader's perspective. it's just a real drag, and i always skip over it. that's just my experience, as a reader. so i try to never use that function in my content. i might have done it at some point in the distant past, but i don't remember

2.1.18  4:10 am   how do you explain what you do on youtube to other people?

     i just upload my videos there

2.1.18  2:12 am   do you get stressed? because going through your reality videos you seem to be stressed out a fair bit of the time

     of course

2.1.18  1:59 am   If you think about it, if everything is stupid and dumb, there would be no intelligence, and how could you tell if something is dumb without the knowledge of something intelligent?

     ah, i think you're starting to get the idea

2.1.18  1:23 am   why does the earth shake sometimes?

     to try to get into a more comfortable position

2.1.18  1:16 am   do you have any tips for playing piano?

     start trying all the notes! should be a pretty wild time

2.1.18  12:38 am   Did you like taking apart things and putting them back together when you were a child?

     not really but i did enjoy looking at things from different angles

2.1.18  12:03 am   what do you mostly want your music to be about

     the world that you and i have come to know and love

2.1.18  12:01 am   I know you probably don't like asking for money but how much money would be helpful from a fan to allow you to buy plants and animals and stuff like that to eat?

     any amount. 0 dollars. a billion dollars. maybe something in between





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

1.31.18  11:53 pm   are you still going to alternate between songs and non-songs?

     i'm not sure

1.31.18  11:49 pm   What do you think is the most foolish thing a person can do? 

     dress up in a fool's costume

1.31.18  11:32 pm   What inspired you to complete "La de da de da de da de dayo" six years after writing the first verse?

     i actually wrote the 1st verse 9 years ago

1.31.18  11:32 pm   they ask why is the sky blue, but is the sky even blue?

     it is in some parts of the world

1.31.18  10:50 pm   do you think music is part of how the universe works, or did we invent it

     i am beginning to think it invented us

1.31.18  10:43 pm   in your opinion, whats the best part of life?

     it's always a surprise

1.31.18  10:42 pm   what is your marketing strategy

     make the damn market myself

1.31.18  10:30 pm   Were the "wait, no. let's skip that one." and the "what does that say?" lines actually a part of the script for the grass video?

     yes

1.31.18  10:28 pm   Why do you still hesitaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaate-yeah?

     as of february 2, 2014, i can proudly say i do not

1.31.18  10:12 pm   what are your methods for identifying whether something is a meme

     anything can be a meme! if you see a broken VCR on the sidewalk, that is a meme. your nose is likely a meme!

1.31.18  9:58 pm   how can i find myself

     check your neighbour's house

1.31.18  9:55 pm   Is there a method to your madness, so to speak? because I feel like all these projects are trying to do something interesting....

     ah you may have spotted it just

1.31.18  9:34 pm   Use a capital letter in my answer? Would be rarer than the super-blue-blood moon

     that's not true

1.31.18  9:28 pm   How do you feel about being a featured creator of VidCon?

     good, very nice

1.31.18  9:20 pm   1.29.18  2:07 pm Hey, just want to say thanks! I tried your suggestion and randomizing the hits/rests with the triplets has been super helpful. I also have this app on my phone that's like a metronome but you can plug in the specific rhythm notation, so I've been doing that to check to make sure my timing is good. Couple more questions about this whole thing. Are triplets almost always going going to be grouped in 3's?  Maybe its not really common cause I'm not seeing it in any of my sheet music, but would you ever see something like one eighth note/rest triplet just by itself immediately followed by a 'regular', non-triplet note/rest?

     heads would explode, that would simply not be readable by any normal human

      And will triplets almost always start right at the top of the beat, like would you ever see 3 quarter note triplets, but starting on the "and" of the beat? How would you count out stuff where you kind of have to subdivide a single beat into 3's as well as into 2's or 4 's for regular eighth or sixteenth notes? (sorry if this is all jumbled, I hope you understand what I mean though).

     something to that effect could happen, on a larger scale, for example you could have quarter note triplets starting on beat 2 or 4. but effectively what that would be is 8th note triplets hitting every other one. for example, take the percussion/hi-hat accents in that song 'everybody wants to rule the world' that's doing this. it would be not practical to write it as quarter note triplets, you would want to write that as 8th note triplets alternated with 8th note rests, starting with a rest, and lining up with the downbeats on 2 and 4

1.31.18  9:11 pm   are you working on a song next?

     i wish

1.31.18  9:07 pm   i dont believe you when you say you get a lot of spongebob related questions

     fair enough,

1.31.18  8:35 pm   do u think one day i can be not sad anymore

     yes

1.31.18  8:32 pm   how long does it take you to come up with ideas for the videos where music is not the focus? (blades of grass)?

     that video was written in probably less than 20 minutes. the same is true with the soap and steve videos. other videos may vary, especially if they have non-fictional elements

1.31.18  8:32 pm   Where is the idea store?

     look around you

1.31.18  8:32 pm   what should i do if life hands me lemons?

     sell lemons?

1.31.18  8:16 pm   what do you think is the most important quality a person can have?

     surprise me

1.31.18  7:39 pm   What was I'm crazy/it's raining about?

      1.21.18  12:57 pm

1.31.18  7:27 pm   What is wealth?

     being rich, that sort of thing

1.31.18  7:01 pm   Even if you didn't ever use capital letters, I wouldn't treat it like a big deal when you do. Just because someone doesn't ever do  a thing doesn't  mean they will never do that thing eventually. Tell this to all those who freak out when they see u use a capital letter.

     ok, i will tell them

1.31.18  6:47 pm   Why do you not caption your Instagram posts?

     i think it's stronger to let the images do the talking

     Do you leave the jokes to Twitter?

1.31.18  6:09 pm   Which is the best chemical reaction?

     explosions

1.31.18  5:29 pm   Can you help me remember my question? 

     sure, it was can you help me remember my question

1.31.18  5:20 pm   Does anything rhyme with purple or orange?

     sure

1.31.18  5:10 pm   is ther something secret in this page?

     your question is a secret!

1.31.18  5:03 pm   are you still hiring?

     no but i could

1.31.18  5:02 pm   is believe in god?

     sure, maybe more
